moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

ability.name: Damage Swap
ability.description: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.

ability.name: Rain Dance
ability.description: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach 1 Water Energy card to 1 of your Water Pokémon. (This doesn't use up your 1 Energy card attachment for the turn.) This power can't be used if Blastoise is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

moves.name: Scrunch
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Chansey during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

moves.name: Double-edge
moves.description: Chansey does 80 damage to itself.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

ability.name: Energy Burn
ability.description: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type the Defending Pokémon is, Clefairy's type is still Colorless.)

moves.name: Bubblebeam
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Strikes Back
ability.description: Whenever your opponent's attack damages Machamp (even if Machamp is Knocked Out), this power does 10 damage to the attacking Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power can't be used if Machamp is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when your opponent attacks.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Selfdestruct
moves.description: Does 20 damage to each Pokémon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Magneton does 80 damage to itself.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

moves.name: Barrier
moves.description: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo during your opponent's next turn.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

moves.name: Lure
moves.description: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and switch it with his or her Active Pokémon.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Ninetales in order to use this attack.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Poliwrath but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.

moves.name: Whirlpool
moves.description: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Raichu.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: Flip a coin. If tails, Raichu does 30 damage to itself.

ability.name: Energy Trans
ability.description: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

moves.name: Twineedle
moves.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: Does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

moves.name: Thundershock
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Thunderpunch
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage plus Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

moves.name: Electric Shock
moves.description: Flip a coin. If tails, Electrode does 10 damage to itself.

ability.name: Buzzap
ability.description: At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may Knock Out Electrode and attach it to 1 of your other Pokémon. If you do, choose a type of Energy. Electrode is now an Energy card (instead of a Pokémon) that provides 2 energy of that type. You can't use this power if Electrode is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.description: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokémon.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Arcanine in order to use this attack.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: Arcanine does 30 damage to itself.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon in order to use this attack.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Leek Slap
moves.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. Either way, you can't use this attack again as long as Farfetch'd stays in play (even putting Farfetch'd on the Bench won't let you use it again).

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.description: You can't use this attack unless the Defending Pokémon is Asleep.

moves.name: Poisonpowder
moves.description: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

moves.name: Doubleslap
moves.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Kadabra in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Kadabra.

moves.name: Stiffen
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Kakuna during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

moves.name: Poisonpowder
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: Does 50 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Machoke.

moves.name: Submission
moves.description: Machoke does 20 damage to itself.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Magikarp.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Magmar in order to use this attack.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

moves.name: Doubleslap
moves.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

moves.name: Conversion 1
moves.description: If the Defending Pokémon has a Weakness, you may change it to a type of your choice other than Colorless.

moves.name: Conversion 2
moves.description: Change Porygon's Resistance to a type of your choice other than Colorless.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.description: Does damage to the Defending Pokémon equal to half the Defending Pokémon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Wartortle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.description: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

moves.name: Sleeping Gas
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokémon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent's next turn, Knock Out that Pokémon.

moves.name: Foul Gas
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned; if tails, it is now Confused.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Selfdestruct
moves.description: Does 10 damage to each Pokémon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Magnemite does 40 damage to itself.

moves.name: Stiffen
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Horn Hazard
moves.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Onix (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

moves.name: Thunder Jolt
moves.description: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Poliwag but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd don't count.

moves.name: Sand-attack
moves.description: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Squirtle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Discard 1 Water Energy card attached to Starmie in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Starmie.

moves.name: Star Freeze
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

moves.name: Poisonpowder
moves.description: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Clefairy Doll
description: Play Clefairy Doll as if it were a Basic Pokémon. While in play, Clefairy Doll counts a a Pokémon (instead of a Trainer card). Clefairy Doll has no attacks, can't retreat, and can't be Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. If Clefairy Doll is Knocked Out, it doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokémon. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Clefairy Doll.

name: Computer Search
description: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Devolution Spray
description: Choose 1 of your own Pokémon in play and a Stage of Evolution. Discard all Evolution cards of that Stage or higher attached to that Pokémon. That Pokémon is no longer Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or anything else that might be the result of an attack (just as if you had evolved it).

name: Impostor Professor Oak
description: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck, then draws 7 cards.

name: Item Finder
description: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Lass
description: You and your opponent show each other your hands, then shuffle all the Trainer cards from your hands into your decks.

name: Pokémon Breeder
description: Put a Stage 2 Evolution card from your hand on the matching Basic Pokémon. You can only play this card when you would be allowed to evolve that Pokémon anyway.

name: Pokémon Trader
description: Trade 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards in your hand for 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from your deck. Show both cards to your opponent. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Scoop Up
description: Choose 1 of your Pokémon in play and return its Basic Pokémon card to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)

name: Super Energy Removal
description: Discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon in order to choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and up to 2 Energy cards attached to it. Discard those Energy cards.

name: Defender
description: Attach Defender to 1 of your Pokémon. At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard Defender. Damage done to that Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Energy Retrieval
description: Trade 1 of the other cards in your hand for up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile.

name: Full Heal
description: Your Active Pokémon is no longer Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned.

name: Maintenance
description: Shuffle 2 of the other cards from your hand into your deck in order to draw a card.

name: PlusPower
description: Attach PlusPower to your Active Pokémon. At the end of your turn, discard PlusPower. If this Pokémon's attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the attack does 10 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Center
description: Remove all damage counters from all of your own Pokémon with damage counters on them, then discard all Energy cards attached to those Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Flute
description: Choose 1 Basic Pokémon card from your opponent's discard pile and put it onto his or her Bench. (You can't play Pokémon Flute if your opponent's Bench is full.)

name: Pokédex
description: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and rearrange them as you like.

name: Professor Oak
description: Discard your hand, then draw 7 cards.

name: Revive
description: Put 1 Basic Pokémon card from your discard pile onto your Bench. Put damage counters on that Pokémon equal to half its HP (rounded down to the nearest 10). (You can't play Revive if your Bench is full.)

name: Super Potion
description: Discard 1 Energy card attached to your own Pokémon in order to remove up to 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.

name: Bill
description: Draw 2 cards.

name: Energy Removal
description: Choose 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and discard it.

name: Gust of Wind
description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with his or her Active Pokémon.

name: Potion
description: Remove up to 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Switch
description: Switch 1 of your own Benched Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

name: Double Colorless Energy
description: Provides two Colorless energy
